trigger.Name: trConv
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() if Plf then Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) end
local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 25*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 25*0.74
ValidateGameVersion()
local b = SpawnMessageBox( "8801" )
if b == 1 then TDeactivate("RrybakRoadStart") PassToMap("r1m3", "FromR1M4", -1 ) else SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
FlyAround(1, 0, 25, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic()
Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() if Plf then Plf:SetExternalPathByName("ReturnPath") end
TActivate("trConv_End") end
